name: Space Raiders (itch) (Heroayd)
description:
You have found an old game called Space Raiders. You remember it as one of your classic and favorite games on the pc. Likewise, you put it in and start playing. Unfortunately, you have no idea what nightmare are you gonna go through.

what the game contains:

normal mode where you can survive and get one of 2 endings

endless mode

two languages: ENG and Slovak

The game will give you about 20 minutes of gameplay

GAMEPLAY:

Control a spaceship with WASD and the arrow keys, shoot with Mouse1 or Z. 

Survive as long as you can. Good luck. #retro #shooter #arcade #horror
